short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features

- Customize layout by way of dragging and dropping elements
- Vibrant buttons, tailor the hues of link buttons as desired
- Synchronize and manage numerous settings through GitHub Gist
- Embrace the integration of dark mode themes
- Utilize the clipboard for cross-platform content harmonization
